00019 #include <qcombobox.h>
00020 #include <qstringlist.h>
00021 #include <qlineedit.h>
00022 #include <qlistbox.h>
00023 #include <qevent.h>
00024 
00025 #include "journalEditAccountList.h"
00026 
00027 JournalEditAccountList::JournalEditAccountList(QWidget *parent, const QStringList newAccounts, const QString newText)
00028     : QComboBox(TRUE, parent), accounts(newAccounts), curText(newText)
00029 {
00030     list = new QListBox(this, "journalEditAccountList::list");
00031     setListBox(list);
00032     list->setSelectionMode(QListBox::NoSelection);
00033     list->setEnabled(false);
00034 
00035     editor = new QLineEdit(curText, this, "journalEditAccountList::editor");
00036     setLineEdit(editor);
00037 
00038     setSizeLimit(10);
00039 
00040     insertStringList(accounts);    // even though this is cleared on focusInEvent,
00041                                    // it's necessary to create a listbox that's the full size
00042 
00043     editor->setText(curText);
00044     
00045     setInsertionPolicy(QComboBox::NoInsertion);
00046 
00047     connect(editor, SIGNAL(textChanged(const QString&)), this, SLOT(changed(const QString&)));
00048     
00049 }
00050 
00051 void JournalEditAccountList::changed(const QString &newText)
00052 {
00053     curText = newText;
00054 
00055     list->clear();
00056 
00057     for(QStringList::Iterator it = accounts.begin(); it != accounts.end(); it++)
00058     {
00059         if((*it).startsWith(curText))
00060             list->insertItem(*it);
00061     }
00062 
00063 }
00064 
00065 QString JournalEditAccountList::currentText() const
00066 {
00067     return curText;
00068 }
00069 
00070 void JournalEditAccountList::focusInEvent(QFocusEvent *event)
00071 {
00072     QComboBox::focusInEvent(event);
00073     popup();
00074     changed(curText);
00075 }
00076 
00077 void JournalEditAccountList::focusOutEvent(QFocusEvent *event)
00078 {
00079     QComboBox::focusOutEvent(event);
00080     if(event->reason() == QFocusEvent::Mouse ||
00081        event->reason() == QFocusEvent::Tab ||
00082        event->reason() == QFocusEvent::Backtab)
00083         list->hide();
00084 }
